TT digs back into painful memories.

TT:  Let's just say it's not ALWAYS best to keep your mouth shut.  
And the onlyway to atone is to kill my own brother.  My on oil and 
steel.  Let's just leave it at that o.k..

OOC: I forgot to post him getting that vile of green stuff.  I'm not 
going to say what it is, but it's not illegal, and it's only useful to 
boost the story.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> TT:  Listen I don't know who you are and I don't really give a rip. 
 I 
> just want a way off this stupid planet so I can get back to work.  
> Atonement must be made for my crimes.
> 
> {Panthos - Africa}
> 
> (OOC) 
> 
> heh off the deep end characters are always fun...
> 
> (IC)
> 
> The panther looks to the smoking crater left by the bots destroyed 
craft and chuckling hardly fazed by the fact the gun is now pointed 
his way. "I'd say friend your chances of getting off this dirt ball 
just went up in smoke so to speak."
> 
>     Lazily stretching letting his beast modes claws lightly rend the 
earth under his paws. "Though atonement for crimes is always 
interesting, what crimes might you be accused of hmm?"
